articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 
Jake Chervinsky: "Crypto people shouldn't support Elon buying Twitter because centralization" 🙄
Meh. It's already a centralized company. Elon buying it doesn't stop anyone from building decentralized alternatives. It might make Twitter better.
Liking crypto doesn't mean hating everything else.

banteg: It's sad freedom of speech has so few friends we have to rely on the benevolence and principles of a few tech billionaires like Durov and Musk.
Hope we can do better one day, but for now I welcome our new Twitter overlords.
